Description:
Job Purpose:The Sr. Windows & Citrix Administrator is responsible for managing CBQ Citrix and Windows infrastructures spanning multiple sites. The responsibilities include administrating the day-to-day technical activities related to maintaining reliable and effective Citrix and Windows environments responsive to the requirements of Information Systems.Key Accountabilities:Configuring and administering Citrix XenApp infrastructure and later
Configuring and administering Xendesktop infrastructure spanning across multiple sites
Configuring and administering Provisioning and Machine Creation Services.
Configuring and administering Storefront / Web interface Servers.
Configuring and administering NetScaler, Access Gateway, Load Balance, Routes, Services, Virtual servers and GSLB.
Configuring and administering XenMobile, ShareFile, and Rights Signature.
Plan and failover Citrix component during Disaster Recovery.
Assists in the monthly patching of server systems which is part of the maintenance activity using System Center Configuration Manager.
Be a part of the existing projects.
Develop & Executes PowerShell or Command Shell commands and experience in scripting.
Diagnosing and resolving performance issues.
Maintaining consistent system documentation.
Coordinating, managing, and validating software and environment changes.
Perform installations and upgrades during the weekend maintenance window.
Configuring and administering applications in a Citrix / Windows Server Environment.
Comply with CBQ Change Management processes and best practices.
Provide technical leadership for upcoming projects.
Lead design updates and architecture revisions.Skills
